abstract: Connecting people and things, whether by job function, personal interest or a particular kind of computer equipment, is an immense growth business. Companies are finding all kinds of ways to extract value by building conversations. So specialized social networks are being created in order to make businesses work together better.

headline.main: Facebooks for Doctors, Lawyers and Robots
